content.title: DPIIT Internship Scheme
content.department: Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT), Ministry of Commerce & Industry
content.beneficiary: Students pursuing Under Graduate/Post Graduate degrees or Research Scholars
content.details: DPIIT Internship Scheme is implemented for students pursuing Under Graduate/Post Graduate degrees or Research Scholars enrolled in recognized University/Institution within India or abroad. The objective is to give exposure to students to understand the working culture of the Government of India and the schemes being run by this Department.
benefits: Maximum number of interns selected at a time will not be more than 20
Experience Certificate awarded after completing the internship
eligibility: Applicants pursuing Graduation/Post Graduation/Research in Engineering
Candidates from other domains can also be considered based on requirements on a case-by-case basis
documents_required: Bank Details (for the payment of stipend)

faqs.question: Under which Ministry is DPIIT?
faqs.answer: The Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT) is under the Ministry of Commerce & Industry of the Govt. of India.

faqs.question: Are Research Scholars also eligible to apply to this internship scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scheme is open to students pursuing Under Graduate/Post Graduate degrees or Research Scholars enrolled in recognized universities/Institutions within India or abroad.

faqs.question: Is there a deadline for submitting the application for the internship?
faqs.answer: Online portal on DPIIT’s shall be open during the period from 1st March to 30th April and 1st September to 31st October of every year for receiving applications from Students for internship.

faqs.question: How long will the internship be?
faqs.answer: Students can choose a period of their choice ranging from one month /two months / three months as per their requirements during the aforementioned slots.

faqs.question: Are the applications submitted online?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Applications are Accepted Online Only.

faqs.question: Are only the students from some specific educational domains eligible to apply?
faqs.answer: Yes, applicants pursuing Graduation/Post Graduation/Research in specific domains are eligible to apply.

faqs.question: Is there an application link?
faqs.answer: Yes, the students are required to submit their application through the application form given at this link: https://dpiit.gov.in/internship/internship-scheme.php

faqs.question: Do I need to provide my Mobile Number and Email ID at the time of application?
faqs.answer: Yes, both Mobile Number and Email ID are required for the successful submission of the application.

faqs.question: Which documents are accepted as a Proof of Age / Date of Birth?
faqs.answer: The following documents are accepted as proof of age /date of birth: Marksheet Class 10th/12th, Birth Certificate.

faqs.question: Will the Intern be provided an Experience Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, after completing the internship, the intern will be awarded an Experience Certificate.
